In `r maxyr`, the Resource Assessment and Conservation Engineering (RACE) division of the National Marine Fisheries Service’s (NMFS) Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC) conducted the `r str1`. `r nbs_str0` `r stringr::str_to_sentence(NMFSReports::numbers2words(nrow(vessel_info)))` stern trawler`r ifelse(nrow(vessel_info)>1, "s", "")`, the `r text_list(paste0(vessel_info$length_m, "-m ",  vessel_info$vessel_ital)) `, were chartered for `r ifelse(SRVY=="NEBS", "these surveys", "the survey")`. Demersal populations of fishes and invertebrates were sampled by trawling for 30 minutes at stations arranged on a systematic grid, which consisted of `r text_list(paste0(haul_cruises_maxyr$stations_avail, " total stations in the ", haul_cruises_maxyr$SRVY))`. At each station, species composition, length distribution, and age structure samples were collected from ecologically and commercially important species. `r str0 `. 


```{r }
#| label: abstract_temperature

# long-term mean --------------------------------
temp0 <- temps_avg_yr

str02 <- ""

if (sum(temps_avg_yr$SRVY == "NBS") >= 6 |   # TOLEDO - may do NBS in the future when there are more years?
    sum(temp0$SRVY == "NBS") != 0) { #this year has NBS data, too
temp0 <- temp0 %>% 
  dplyr::filter(SRVY == "EBS")
str02 <- paste0("NBS mean surface and bottom temperatures were not calculated because the NBS has only been surveyed ",
                        numbers2words(x = haul_cruises_maxyr$yrofsurvey[haul_cruises_maxyr$SRVY %in% "NBS"]),
                        " times since ",
                        haul_cruises_maxyr$SRVY_start[haul_cruises_maxyr$SRVY %in% "NBS"],". ")
}

str01 <- ""
# warmer than previous year/how many consecutive years?
# temp<-temp0
for (i in 1:length(unique(temp0$SRVY))){
  
  temp <- temp0 %>% 
    dplyr::filter(year == maxyr)
    
  if (sum(temp$nthyr > 1)>(nrow(temp)-1)) { # 
    str01 <- paste0(str01, 
                           text_list(
      paste0("The recent trend of ",
             ifelse(grepl(pattern = "warm", x = temp$case), "higher", "lower"),
                         "-than-average temperatures continued on the ", temp$SRVY, " shelf for the ",
                         numbers2words_th(x = temp$nthyr, type = "word"),
                         " consecutive year. ")))
  }
  
  # were both sst and bt both warmer/colder?
  if (grepl(pattern = "both", x = temp$case)) { # they were both...
    str01 <- paste0(str01, "In ", maxyr,", both the mean surface (",
                           round(x = temp$st, digits = 1),
                           "°C) and bottom (",
                           round(x = temp$bt, digits = 1),
                           "°C) water temperatures were ", 
                           ifelse(grepl(pattern = "warm", x = temp$case), "warmer", "colder"))
  } else { # they were not both...
    str01 <- paste0(str01, "In ", maxyr,", the surface (",
                           round(x = temp$st, digits = 1),
                           "°C) were ",
                         ifelse(temp$st_mean, "warmer", "colder"),
                         " and bottom (",
                           round(x = temp$bt, digits = 1),
                           "°C) water temperatures were ", 
                         ifelse(temp$bt_mean, "warmer", "colder"))
  }
}

str0 <- paste0(str01,
                       " than the survey long-term average of surface (",
                       round(x = mean(temp$st_mean, na.rm = T), digits = 1),
                       "°C) and bottom (",
                       round(x = mean(temp$bt_mean, na.rm = T), digits = 1),
                       "°C). ")

# if this year is within the 6th warmest or coldest years...
if (temp$warmest_rank<(nrow(temps_avg_yr)-6) | temp$warmest_rank<6) {  
  str0 <- paste0(str0, 
                 "The ", maxyr, " mean bottom temperatures were the ",
                 ifelse(temp$warmest_rank<(nrow(temps_avg_yr)-6), 
                        paste0(ifelse(temp$warmest_rank == 1, "", 
                               paste0(NMFSReports::numbers2words_th(temp$warmest_rank), " ")),
                                      "warmest"), 
                        paste0(ifelse((nrow(temps_avg_yr)-temp$warmest_rank) == 1, "", 
                               paste0(NMFSReports::numbers2words_th(nrow(temps_avg_yr)-
                                                               temp$warmest_rank), " ")), 
                        "coldest")), 
                             " observed since the beginning of the EBS shelf bottom trawl survey time series in 1982. ")
}

str0 <- paste0(str0, str02)
```

A total of `r fish_sp ` species of fishes were identified during the `r text_list(SRVY1)` survey`r ifelse(SRVY=="NEBS", "s", "")`, representing `r fish_genera` genera and `r fish_family` families, as well as `r invert_spp ` invertebrate taxa. In total, organisms representing `r invert_phyla` phyla were identified in the catch.

This report compares the distribution and relative abundance of `r xunits(length(unique(report_spp1$order[report_spp1$taxon == "fish"])))`  fish species and `r xunits(length(unique(report_spp1$order[report_spp1$taxon == "invert"])))` invertebrate taxa with side-by-side maps from the `r compareyr ` and `r maxyr` `r text_list(SRVY1)` shelf bottom trawl surveys. For select and common fish species, abundance-at-length plots comparing the `r compareyr ` and `r maxyr` `r text_list(SRVY1)` surveys are also presented. Survey results reported herein include estimates of bottom trawl survey biomass for most fishes and invertebrates, and estimates of population size, geographic distributions, and abundance-at-length of select fish species. Appendices provide tables listing population estimates by sex and size group for principal fish species (Appendix Tables `r NMFSReports::crossref(list_tables, "tab_app_taxa_encountered_*_invertebrate", "number", exact = FALSE)`) and species encountered during the `r text_list(SRVY1)` survey`r ifelse(SRVY=="NEBS", "s", "")` (Appendix Tables `r NMFSReports::crossref(list_tables, "tab_app_principal_fish_", "number", exact = FALSE)`).
